dialogStrings:
Here's a barrel.
If I can just push it over…

Here's a barrel.
If I can just push it over…{PAUSE}Push the barrel?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

{Cloud}
“I know.
Looks like they aren't going to let us go.”

{Cloud}
“Well we can't let them catch us, can we?
There's only one thing left to do.”

{Aeris}
“Right.
Make sure they don't get through!”

Reno
“The Ancient is getting away!
Attack! Attack!
> Attack!”

Reno
“Think we killed 'em?
They never should've fought us!”

{Aeris}
“We'll get out through
the hole in the roof.”

{Aeris}
“Jump off that beam,
and we should be able to make it
through to the roof.”
